title: shapedrawer
author: chriserin
description: This started out as an experiment to create fonts+typography out of html+css shapes.  Whether or not that was achieved is up for judgement, it was fun though.  It is an extensive single page backbone.js + coffeescript application written when those technologies received a big boost by the introduction of the asset pipeline in Rails.
